Text: It doesn't take propaganda to understand that every garden variety idiot should not be able to own a gun.  Then again, as long as its confined to the US, perhaps everyone should be issued one or more guns at birth.  One or two generations later and the world might be a better place....
Free men own guns, slaves don't.

way better than the knock off version with colin farell. from what i understand this was a direct to dvd release. the other version made it to the theater. only difference is that colin is held hostage in a phone booth instead of a hot dog cart.
